description:
For any invalid request format we should return 400, not 422, we should fix this case for v2 security_groups API. That is also good for sharing the unittest between v2.1 and v2.

To change the API that follow the rule: https://wiki.openstack.org/wiki/APIChangeGuidelines
title: Use 400 instead of 422 for security_groups v2 API
